name: create_zoho_ticket
description: Creates a support ticket in Zoho Desk when a customer needs help, reports an issue, or requests assistance that requires follow-up. Use this when the customer's issue cannot be resolved immediately in the conversation.

request_body_schema.description: Request body for creating a Zoho Desk support ticket

properties.name: subject
properties.description: Brief summary of the customer's issue or request (max 255 characters)

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of the issue, including any error messages, steps taken, or context provided by the customer

properties.name: email
properties.description: Customer's email address for follow-up communication

properties.name: priority
properties.description: Urgency level: High (service down, critical issue), Medium (feature not working, moderate impact), Low (general inquiry, minor issue)

properties.name: departmentId
properties.description: Department ID for routing. Use 1214071000000006907 for general inquiries, 1214071000000390035 for bugs/support, 1214071000000402481 for new features. Leave empty for default routing.
